extracted-table.table-caption: Clinical and laboratory data of patients (included in the fMRI group analyses).

caption.p: Clinical and laboratory data of patients (included in the fMRI group analyses).

fn.p: M, male. F, female. CSF Hcrt, orexin concentration in cerebrospinal fluid. HLA-DQBI, one kind of human leukocyte antigen. MSLT-SL, average RME latency in multiple sleep latency test. MSLT-SOREMPs, the number of occurrences of REM sleep in multiple sleep latency test.

extracted-table.table-caption: Demographic and clinical characteristics of NT1 and HC groups.

caption.p: Demographic and clinical characteristics of NT1 and HC groups.

fn.p: NT1, narcolepsy type 1. HCs, healthy controls. F, female. M, male. SDS, Self-rating Depression Scale. SAS, Self-rating Anxiety Scale. PSQI, Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index. ESS, Epworth Sleepiness Scale. ISI, Insomnia Severity Scale. MFI-20, Multidimensional Fatigue Inventory. REM, rapid eye movement. MSLT-SL, average RME latency in multiple sleep latency test. MSLT-SOREMPs, the mean sleep latency for 5 naps in multiple sleep latency test. SOL, sleep onset latency. TST, total sleep time. a The p-value was obtained using a chi-square test. b The p-value was obtained using two-sample t tests.
